channel.title: Adding Turmoil/SoulSplit [508]
channel.description: Ye I want to add the turmoil and soul split prayers, the animation would be a cool thing, but I don't mind if theres no animation for it, I just want the effect and the icon over your head for soul split. So is there a tutorial on how I can make them or anything?

item.title: Adding Turmoil/SoulSplit [508]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“freakinlost, post:5, topic:349304”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=445678.msg3297467#msg3297467 date=1281042319]

Silly newbs.
[/quote]Just because other people don’t spend hundreds of dollars on advertising doesn’t mean they are noobs.
If you aren’t going to help, don’t post.

OT - There aren’t any in 508, but you can follow the Custom Sprite tutorial and replace a different prayer.

actually thats where your wrong and i thought this also but heres proof i was rep-- for posting there saying this can’t be 508 lol

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,437579.0.html

all i can say for on topic try and rip from there[/quote]Ye.a, it’s custom sprites…

Read full topic
